# ispconfig_email_domain (Data Source)

Fetches an email domain from ISP Config.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ispconfig_email_domain" "example" {
  id = 42
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (Number) The ID of the email domain.

### Read-Only

- `active` (String) Whether the domain is active ('y' or 'n').
- `domain` (String) The email domain name.
- `server_id` (Number) The mail server ID.
